mapper.select: SELECT POST_ID, TITLE, AUTHOR, CONTENT_TEXT, CREATED_AT, VIEW_COUNT, ATTACHMENT_URL, LIKE_COUNT, UPDATED_AT FROM BOARD_POSTS ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC
SELECT POST_ID, TITLE, AUTHOR, CONTENT_TEXT, CREATED_AT, VIEW_COUNT, ATTACHMENT_URL, LIKE_COUNT, UPDATED_AT FROM BOARD_POSTS WHERE POST_ID = #{postId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_POSTS( POST_ID, TITLE, AUTHOR, CONTENT_TEXT, CREATED_AT, VIEW_COUNT, ATTACHMENT_URL, LIKE_COUNT, UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( POSTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{author}, #{contentText}, SYSDATE, 0, #{attachmentUrl}, 0, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_POSTS SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT_TEXT = #{contentText}, ATTACHMENT_URL = #{attachmentUrl}, UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE POST_ID = #{postId}
